sentences.sContent: A better tip still is to get off your bottom and strut ( or even traipse) around the office.
sentences.sContent_eng: A better tip still is to get off your bottom and strut ( or even traipse) around the office.
sentences.sCn: 还有个更好的建议，就是站起来，饶著办公室大踏步，甚至可以到处闲逛。

trans.tranOther: to walk somewhere in a slow or unwilling way because you are tired or bored
